'''install''' - Download a specific rock or rockspec file from a rocks server.

== Usage ==

:'''[[luarocks]] download <nowiki>[</nowiki>--all<nowiki>]</nowiki> <nowiki>[</nowiki>--source<nowiki>]</nowiki> <nowiki>[</nowiki>--rockspec<nowiki>]</nowiki> <nowiki>[</nowiki>--arch=''arch''<nowiki>]</nowiki> <nowiki>[</nowiki>''name'' <nowiki>[</nowiki>''version''<nowiki>]</nowiki><nowiki>]</nowiki>'''

Argument may be the name of a rock to be fetched from a server or a filename of a locally available rock. In case of more than one rock matching the request, the "install" command favors binary rocks.

== Example ==

 luarocks download --rockspec lpeg
